Borov
Starting out as a barman for the Bandits, Borov later took Yoga's position as the leading bandit in the Zone. Fellow bandits call Borov an "aristocrat wannabe" and Borov himself says that he was a natural born leader, saying that even when he was a kid he knew he was destined to be a leader. bandit_borov bandit 60 -70 actors\bandit\stalker_bandit_borov #include "inventory\borov_zombied_items.xml" #include "dialogs\uband_esc.xml"
Insane Freedom S.T.A.L.K.E.R.
This S.T.A.L.K.E.R. saw something in the Bloodsucker Village that drove him insane and made him extremely paranoid. After running away from the village, he holed up in a cabin near a small marsh just outside the Army Warehouses and proceeded to attack anyone who came too close. Svoboda_zombi_stalker bandit 40 0 actors\stalker_zombi\stalker_zombie5 #include "inventory\stalker_novice_items.xml" #include "dialogs\uband_esc.xml"
#include "character_desc_new_bandit.xml"
